document.title: Technical Bulletins: New Guidelines on Employee Selection Procedures: Some Compliance Considerations
document.abstract: This Technical Bulletin discusses two different sets of federal government guidelines for employee selection procedures. One set is a re-publication of EEOC guidelines first issued in 1970. Another, in which EEOC does not concur, was issued jointly in November 1976 by the Labor and Justice Departments and Civil Service Commission. Both sets apply to local governments.
